features: 【WIDER VIEW, MORE SAFE】This convex rearview mirror provides you with a wider-angle view and perfect vision. 1. eliminating blind spots effectively for safe driving and Makes your reversing safer. 2. Let you know the condition of the child in the back seat more clearly so that you can drive more at ease. 3. Allows you to see the vehicles behind you more clearly, and reversing is safer.
【HIGH QUALITY】Interior rearview mirror is made of high quality and high definition glass providing you perfect visibility and clear & and real images, No more overlapped or distorted images anymore.

【ANTI-FALL】We use a packaging carton to protect the mirror. Foam paper can prevent scratches on the surface of the mirror. There is a shelf inside the packaging box to fix the mirror. Even if it falls from a height of 2 meters, the mirror is still intact.

【EASY TO INSTALL】You only need the 8s to complete the installation, just buckle the adjustable clip on the back of the mirror to the bottom of the original mirror and adjust the angle, note not to press too hard on the mirror.

【UNIVERSAL】The size of the rearview mirror is 11.81 x3.1 inch, longer than most the rearview mirror, which means can offer you a wider field of view than others, and car clip-on design fits universal vehicles, like a car, SUV, CRV, Vans, and Truck.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Safety First, Wider View : This convex rearview mirror provides you wider-angle view and perfect vision No more turning your head or straining your neck to look over your shoulder for better visibility! A wider-angle view and perfect visibility, eliminating blind spots effectively for safe driving. WWith this car-wide mirror, you can see the entire back windows, parts of the backside windows as well as most of the upper half of the back seats. You can observe the baby's state and protect the baby's safetyUsing the rearview mirror, you can see the vehicle behind, which can reduce the blind spots of reversing and make reversing safer

About JOYTUTUS Rearview Mirror JOYTUTUS car rearview mirror design fits for universal type vehicles, such as SUV, CRV, Vans, Truck, MPV, and more other sizesEasy Install: With two adjustable buckles. Just one touch you can fix it on your original interior rearview mirror.Anti-Fall: We use a packaging carton to protect the mirror, Even if it falls from a height of 1.5 meters, the mirror is still intact.Latest convex mirror design - offers you a wider angle view and eliminates blind spots effectively.
1.Attach the adjustable buckle to the rear edge of the rear mirror 2.Pull down the clip and adjust it to conform to your car 3.push the buckle to the bottom 4.Finish installation

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Enhanced Visibility & easy installation
reviews.reviewText: I recently added the JoyTutus Rear View Mirror to my car, and it's made a noticeable difference in my driving experience. Here's why I find it impressive:1. **Enhanced Visibility**: The panoramic convex design of this mirror significantly expands my field of vision, reducing blind spots and making lane changes safer and more confident.2. **Easy Installation**: Installing this mirror is a breeze. It securely clips onto my existing rearview mirror without the need for any tools or complicated adjustments.3. **Sturdy Build**: The mirror feels solid and well-made. It doesn't vibrate or move around while driving, ensuring a clear and steady view of the road behind.4. **No Distortion**: I appreciate that there's no distortion in the reflection. The image remains clear and accurate, helping me judge distances effectively.5. **Universal Fit**: It's designed to fit most vehicles, making it a versatile accessory for car owners looking to improve their rearview visibility.6. **Safety First**: This mirror promotes safe driving by eliminating blind spots and improving overall awareness on the road. It's a valuable addition to any vehicle.7. **Affordable Solution**: Considering the added safety and convenience it provides, the JoyTutus Rear View Mirror is a cost-effective solution to enhance your driving experience.In conclusion, the JoyTutus Rear View Mirror is a simple yet highly effective accessory for any car. It offers improved visibility, enhances safety, and is incredibly easy to install. If you're looking to reduce blind spots and drive with more confidence, I highly recommend giving this panoramic convex mirror a try. It's a valuable addition to any vehicle.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Cheap easy to install and feels luxurious. Definitely an adjustment from regular mirrors as it is not zoomed in. It's very long and I can see my right blind spot with it which is an added bonus. I can see a lot more but it is not zoomed in like most mirrors.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have used a larger rear view mirror for about 45 years: it is not longer but is twice the height of the factory installed mirror. Made viewing better. The JOYTUTUS mirror is tall like the one I have and it is much longer so you do not have blind spots: can easily see both sides for approaching cars. I have to remove the passenger headrests in my Forrester because they block the view out the rear and side window (great design guys!). When I have passengers the headrests block seeing out the side and rear windows. The JOYTUTUS mirror helps to eliminate the side blockage and even the rear view is improved.Since this is a wide view objects appear further back than they really are. This will require some time for you to adapt but once you have used the mirror for 2-4 weeks you will not return to the factory installed mirror.Con: since this wide view you will now see yourself in the mirror every time you view it. I hate mornings but have to leave early to avoid traffic. Nothing worse than looking at myself early in the morning!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good Value, Easy Installation
reviews.reviewText: This wide-view, rear view mirror is so easy to attach over your current mirror--there are two plastic hooks which fit over the top of your current mirror, and two spring-adjustable hooks which fit over the bottom of the mirror and provide a secure fit.The view this mirror provides is quite wide, both vertical and horizontal. You can easily see the entire back seat so you will be able to see your kids feet as well as their faces. The width of the view easily replaces a fish-eye mirror for one (and possibly both) sides of the car. I installed it in a hatchback and I find I can only adjust it to see as far forward on one side as I'd like to be able to see on both sides. I've set it so it provides more of a view on the left side (both because I find it more difficult to look over my left shoulder, and because I'm more concerned about someone coming from behind on the left). I think it could provide a more panoramic view if it were more convex, but it works well and was a good value.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality, easy to mount.
reviews.reviewText: I read the reviews before purchasing and so far, I am satisfied with the product.I will say that it is much bigger than your standard rearview mirror, and it will take some getting used to.But the extra rear-view range is awesome. Very clear and seems to be anti-glare with just a couple trips to judge it. Overall, I think this is a wonderful product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Helps with blind spots
reviews.reviewText: I got this giant mirror for my new car, it looks really good, adds to the “new car” look. It was so easy to put on my mirror, and it helps eliminate blind spots when changing lanes!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy, highly recommended
reviews.reviewText: Highly recommended. Perfect length. Can see everything clearly. Does not cover when I put the visor down. Once you touch it, it will leave finger prints but can wipe off easily. Easily clipped on. Happy with my purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is by far the best rear view mirror... no more blind spots... and it's beyond easy to attach to my existing mirror.

reviews.reviewTitle: The most essential accessory I bought for my car
reviews.reviewText: I didn't know it was so necessary before I bought it. You have a good view of both the people sitting behind you and the view from the rear window. At night, the headlights of the cars behind you do not bother your eyes (no glare). It is very simple to install and dismantle. You can buy it without thinking

Devia ter comprado a mais tempo. Tem curvatura para aumentar o campo de visão, além de ser bem grande. Visualiza muito bem as janelas laterais e pontos cegos, apesar que a cabeça do motorista (eu) fica na frente das janelas da esquerda. Tenho um SUV grande e ajuda muito mesmo. A fixação é boa e fica bem firme, mas em ruas esburacadas percebi um pouco de vibração na imagem que não afeta muito não. Veio meio embaçado/sujo de mãos, mas limpei com sabão de limpar óculos e ficou com imagem excelente. Qualidade ótica boa.
tal vez sea bueno en el sentido de que no te deslumbren las luces del auto que viene detrás, pero no ves bien de noche, solo sombras en la parte posterior

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on October 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: Covers both blind spots & easy to fit.

reviews.reviewText: So in love! i can see literally everything and it’s so aesthetically pleasing. 10/10 recommend
